_sText: This is a redesigned version of the Block Forts arena from Mario Kart 64. I wanted to use this map to learn how to design maps and how the basics of hammer work (such as textures, vector manipulation, etc.). I do know that in the back hallways of the buildings, where it's dark (on purpose, as they're surprise spawns), there's a few spots of light that seem out of place. If anyone has any ideas how to fix that, let me know please. ;) Feel free to post any comments, suggestions, and criticisms. :D (Also, big thanks to everyone who helped me from this and this thread!)
